name: Turn Control
description:
Combat Action: When your active character is Yelan, equip this card.
After Yelan equips this card, immediately use Lingering Lifeline once.
Roll Phase: If Yelan, who has this card equipped, is on the field, 1 Elemental Dice will be rolled as Omni Element for each Elemental Type in your party. (Max 3)
(You must have Yelan in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
descriptionraw:
$[K1]: When your active character is <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[A1209]</color>, equip this card.
After $[A1209] equips this card, immediately use <color=#FFD780FF>$[S12092]</color> once.
Roll Phase: If $[A1209], who has this card equipped, is on the field, 1 Elemental Dice will be rolled as $[K411] for each Elemental Type in your party. (Max 3)
(You must have $[A1209] in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
descriptionreplaced:
<color=#FFFFFFFF>Combat Action</color>: When your active character is <color=#FFFFFFFF>Yelan</color>, equip this card.
After Yelan equips this card, immediately use <color=#FFD780FF>Lingering Lifeline</color> once.
Roll Phase: If Yelan, who has this card equipped, is on the field, 1 Elemental Dice will be rolled as <color=#FFFFFFFF>{SPRITE_PRESET#1111}Omni Element</color> for each Elemental Type in your party. (Max 3)
(You must have Yelan in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
source: Reward for inviting Yelan to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives
